meanings.definition: A substance used in laundry to make whites appear whiter.
meanings.sent1: I poured the blueings into the washing machine to brighten my white clothes.
meanings.sent2: The blueings made the white shirt look even cleaner.
meanings.sent3: The blueings spilled all over the floor, turning it a vibrant shade of blue.
meanings.sent4: Her magic touch with blueings transformed the dull fabric into a dazzling white.
meanings.sent5: The blueings worked like a charm, making the laundry look brand new.

meanings.definition: The act of adding blue coloring to something.
meanings.sent1: She carefully mixed the blueings into the paint to create a beautiful sky color.
meanings.sent2: The artist's masterpiece was enhanced by the addition of blueings.
meanings.sent3: The blueings accidentally spilled into the water, turning it a lovely shade of blue.
meanings.sent4: His blueings technique was so precise, it brought life to the dull canvas.
meanings.sent5: The blueings added a touch of elegance to the plain white walls.

meanings.definition: The process of applying a blue tint to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The blueings were carefully brushed onto the wall, giving it a serene blue hue.
meanings.sent2: With a steady hand, she completed the blueings on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The blueings splattered everywhere, creating a messy but artistic effect.
meanings.sent4: The blueings transformed the room into a peaceful sanctuary.
meanings.sent5: The blueings application was so smooth, it looked like a professional job.
